author: Michael R. Gordon, Max Colchester, Daniel Michaels
title: Russia Stumbles in Biggest Test of Its Military Force
description: Initial setbacks spur fears that Russians will step up firepower
content: The Russian military has faltered early in its invasion of Ukraine, as stiff resistance threatens to turn Moscows hopes for a swift victory into a protracted and costly war, U.S. officials and alliedâ€¦ [+371 chars]
